page.title: 03Great Beards Wood.
page.content: One of the major topics of the modern world is{conservation.}One place in this region where it is evident is Great Beards wood where,on the eastern side,young beech and oak saplings have been planted to replace Great Oaks that have been cut down.The saplings cover an area of six thousand square metres. As in all woods the risk of fire is great,so fire hydrants and hoses are positioned on the paths for easy access. The wood is mainly deciduous, comprising beech and oak,although conifers are in evidence.Electricity pylons run through the wood in certain places,delivering power to nearby homes and other consumers.
